get.description: Get metadata for depositing a token into Kamino's borrow reserve.

examples: Deposit SOL to earn yield on Kamino

post.description: Generate a transaction for depositing a token into Kamino's borrow reserve.

schema.description: The percentage of funds to use (alternative to amount)
The amount to use. Human-readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for withdrawing a token from Kamino's borrow reserve.

post.description: Generate a transaction for withdrawing a token from Kamino's borrow reserve.

schema.description: The percentage of funds to use
The amount to use. Human-readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata associated to a Kamino borrow reserve.

post.description: Get a URL to a specific borrow reserve on Kamino's website

get.description: Get metadata for depositing into a liquidity vault.

schema.description: The side of the vault to deposit to

examples: Deposit SOL to earn yield on Kamino

post.description: Generate a transaction for depositing into Kamino's liquidity vault.

schema.description: The amount to use. Human-readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL
The side of the vault to deposit to

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for withdrawing from a liquidity vault.

examples: Withdraw liquidity from Kamino strategy vault

post.description: Generate a transaction for withdrawing from Kamino's liquidity vault.

schema.description: The percentage of shares to withdraw

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for setting up multiply position (LUT creation).

examples: Setup your multiply position on Kamino

post.description: Generate transactions for setting up multiply position (LUT creation).

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for depositing with leverage/multiply.

examples: Deposit with leverage to multiply your position

post.description: Generate a transaction for depositing with leverage/multiply.

schema.description: The amount to deposit. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for withdrawing from multiply position.

examples: Withdraw from your multiply position on Kamino

post.description: Generate a transaction for withdrawing from multiply position.

schema.description: The percentage of position to withdraw

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for setting up leverage position (LUT creation).

examples: Create LUT for leverage position on Kamino

post.description: Generate transactions for setting up leverage position (LUT creation).

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for opening a leverage position.

post.description: Generate a transaction for opening a leverage position.

schema.description: The amount to deposit. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

get.description: Get metadata for closing a leverage position.

examples: Withdraw from your leverage position on Kamino

post.description: Generate a transaction for closing a leverage position.

schema.description: The percentage of position to withdraw

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

post.description: Generate a transaction to claim all rewards for a farm.

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

schema.description: Vault public key or slug (kebab-case vault name)
Vault public key or slug (kebab-case vault name)
The percentage of funds to use
The amount to use. Human readable value, e.g. 0.1 SOL

account.description: The public key of the account that executes the transaction

schema.description: Vault public key or slug (kebab-case vault name)
